title: Slate: Watch face
summary: Simple and clean analog watch face for Android Wear
developerAddress:
1234 Barclay Street
Apt. 1105
Vancouver, BC
Canada
description: Simple and clean analog watch face for Android Wear 2.0Features:- Enable smooth movement on the second hand- Personalize the second hand with a variety of colors- Support for Text, Ranged, Icon, and Image complications
descriptionHTML:
Simple and clean analog watch face for Android Wear 2.0

Features:
- Enable smooth movement on the second hand
- Personalize the second hand with a variety of colors
- Support for Text, Ranged, Icon, and Image complications
comments: One of my favorite watch faces. The update allows for complications which make it even better.
It's good and simple but I don't like the background. Please add option for black / no background.

The simple, elegant design is fantastic. The tiny shadow on the minute hand makes it distinguishable from the hour hand, making it easier to read while in ambient display. The design also incorporates some material design cues that makes the notifcations and actions feel right at home.
Great watch face Simple design, great look and the customizable colors for the second had are great! Everything I need in a watch face.

The simple watch face I've been looking for! Smooth, easy to use and customizable enough to change daily to match my outfit without being ostentatious and keeping the black background. Thanks! Looks amazing on my Huawei watch!
Great face, only wish we'd get an update for wear 2.0!
recentChanges: Simple and clean analog watch face for Android Wear 2.0
- Support for Text, Ranged, Icon, and Image complications
- Enable smooth movement on the second hand
- Personalize the second hand with a variety of colors
